```{r}
top_50_url <- "https://www.imdb.com/search/title/?groups=top_1000&start=1"
html <- read_html(top_50_url)
top_50 <- html_nodes(html, ".text-muted+ p , .unbold , .genre , .lister-item-header a")
```

```{r}
x <- html_text(top_50) 
y<- str_replace_all(x, "[\r\n]" , "")
str_replace_all(y, "[ ]+" , "")
```

```{r}
data <- function(x){
  html <- read_html(x)
top_50 <- html_nodes(html, ".text-muted+ p , .unbold , .genre , .lister-item-header a")
a <- html_text(top_50) 
b <- str_replace_all(a, "[\r\n]" , "")
str_replace_all(b, "[ ]+" , "")
}
```
